mapper.insert: insert into post (title, content, writer_id) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writerId})
mapper.select: select p.*, m.name as writerName, CONCAT('/uploads/', f.upload_path, f.thumbnail_name) as thumbnailUrl from post p join member m on p.writer_id = m.id left join post_file f on f.post_id = p.id order by p.created_at desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: insert into post_file (post_id, original_name, saved_name, thumbnail_name, upload_path) values (#{postId}, #{originalName}, #{savedName}, #{thumbnailName}, #{uploadPath})
